headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GAULKIN, ROSEANNE F.

snippet: GAULKIN--Roseanne F.,87, passed away at home in New York City on June 17 after a long illness. Beloved mother of David and Daniel, daughter of the late Louis Fusco, Sr. and Mary Fusco. She is also survived by her brother, Louis Fusco. Born and raised in Connecticut, a graduate of Radcliffe, she began her career in human resources in New York City and went on to become a highly regarded real estate agent in New York for more than 20 years. She was actively involved with the Harvard Club of New York where she was the first woman Chairperson of the Admissions Committee and the Program Committee. Lively, humorous and brave, she will be sorely missed by all who knew and loved her. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GAULKIN--Roseanne F.,87, passed away at home in New York City on June 17 after a long illness. Beloved mother of David and Daniel, daughter of the late Louis Fusco, Sr. and Mary Fusco. She is also survived by her brother, Louis Fusco. Born and raised in Connecticut, a graduate of Radcliffe, she began her career in human resources in New York City and went on to become a highly regarded real estate agent in New York for more than 20 years. She was actively involved with the Harvard Club of New York where she was the first woman Chairperson of the Admissions Committee and the Program Committee. Lively, humorous and brave, she will be sorely missed by all who knew and loved her. 1/3
